meta.title: LEGO Resale Market Alerts | Track Retired Sets on eBay | ScoutLoot
meta.description: The only alert system for the LEGO secondary market. Get instant notifications when retired sets, rare collectibles, and mispriced deals appear on eBay. Track prices across USA, Canada, UK & Europe.
meta.keywords: LEGO resale alerts, retired LEGO sets, secondary market LEGO, eBay LEGO deals, LEGO collector alerts, discontinued LEGO tracker

hero.badge: The First Secondary Market Alert System
hero.subtitle: Get instant alerts when retired sets, rare collectibles, and mispriced deals appear on eBay and other marketplaces. Find listings from sellers who don't know what they have, need to sell fast, or simply priced it wrong. The only tool built for collectors hunting the secondary market.

unique_value.section_subtitle: We're not another retail price tracker. We monitor the secondary market where the real deals happen.
unique_value.point1_desc: While others track retail stores, we monitor eBay and resale marketplaces where collectors sell to collectors. Find mispriced listings from sellers who don't know the market value, need quick cash, or simply made a pricing mistake.
unique_value.point2_desc: Looking for that UCS set that retired 3 years ago? We track sets that are no longer in stores ‚Äî the ones collectors actually want and retail trackers can't help you find.
unique_value.point3_desc: Every alert shows the real cost: item price + shipping to your country. No surprises, no hidden costs. Know exactly what you'll pay before you click.
unique_value.point4_desc: We scan 9 eBay marketplaces ‚Äî US, CA, UK, DE, FR, ES, IT, NL, BE ‚Äî with delivery across all of Europe, USA, and Canada. Find deals from sellers worldwide, shipped to your door.

how_it_works.section_subtitle: Three steps to never overpay on the secondary market again
how_it_works.step1_desc: Search by set number or name. Set your target price ‚Äî the maximum you're willing to pay including shipping. Add filters for condition, seller rating, and ship-from country.
how_it_works.step2_desc: Our system scans eBay and other marketplaces continuously, looking for mispriced listings and below-market deals. We calculate total cost with shipping and check every listing against your criteria.
how_it_works.step3_desc: When a deal matches, get notified instantly via Telegram, push notification, or email ‚Äî your choice. All the details you need to decide fast, because mispriced deals don't last long.

features.section_subtitle: Everything you need to hunt the secondary market effectively
features.feature1_desc: Scan 9 eBay marketplaces across USA, Canada, UK & Europe. Find mispriced deals that local searchers miss.
features.feature2_desc: Every price includes shipping to your country. For UK buyers, we even estimate import charges. True cost, always.
features.feature3_desc: Telegram, push notifications, or email ‚Äî you choose. Be the first to see new listings. Speed wins when you're hunting mispriced deals.
features.feature4_desc: Filter by condition (new/used), minimum seller rating, ship-from country, and exclude keywords. No junk, no minifig-only listings.
features.feature5_desc: One alert per listing, best deal per set per day. Quality over quantity ‚Äî we respect your notification inbox.
features.feature6_desc: See what sets have sold for recently. Track market trends. Know when a deal is actually a deal.

target_audience.section_subtitle: Built for collectors who take the secondary market seriously
target_audience.audience1_desc: Track retired sets you've been hunting for years. Get alerts the moment a mispriced listing appears.
target_audience.audience2_desc: Monitor discontinued sets for below-market opportunities. Catch sellers who don't know what they have.
target_audience.audience3_desc: Find that specific set your kid wants ‚Äî even if it's been retired for years. No more overpaying on resale.

demo_alert.section_subtitle: A real alert with everything you need to decide

pricing.section_subtitle: Start free, upgrade when you need more watches and faster alerts

cta_section.title: Ready to Hunt the Secondary Market?
cta_section.subtitle: Join collectors who catch mispriced deals before anyone else.

about_creator.line1: Built by a LEGO collector in Europe.
about_creator.line2: Because I needed this tool and it didn't exist.

footer.tagline: The smartest way to track the LEGO resale market.
